member.name: T:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.IJsonRpcClientHandler
member.summary: Provides methods for transmitting the client-side JSON RPC messages.

member.name: M:JsonRpc.Standard.Client.IJsonRpcClientHandler.SendAsync(JsonRpc.Standard.RequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends a JSON RPC Request message, and wait for the Response (if the Request is not a Notification).
member.param: The request message to be sent.
A token used to cancel the transmitting request, or to stop waiting for the Response.
member.returns: A task that returns JSON RPC response, or null if the Request is a Notification.
member.exception: An exception has occurred while transmitting the request. Note that a JSON RPC Response with Error will be returned and no exception should be thrown.

A token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task contains the response of the request, or that contains null if the specified request does not need a response.
member.exception: A with the same id has been sent. You need to try with a different id.
(Can be .) The operation has been cancelled.
